Question.Subject: Help - Moderator on Discussion Forum Blocking My Computer?
Question.Content: I had an account with a discussion forum. I opened a second account for separate issues in the forum. Both my accounts are now banned by the moderator for having more than one account. How did they know I opened a second account - I opened it with a separate email address and screen name? I want to get a new account but the sign in page is automatically locked. Is there something I can change in my computer or internet settings to open another account?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Same IP address. There's nothing you can do. Try actually following the rules of the forum for once, 'kay?

Answer.Content: Same IP address. There's nothing you can do. Try actually following the rules of the forum for once, 'kay?
